newsitem.title: ITALY: Two Fiat units suspended pending statement.
newsitem.headline: Two Fiat units suspended pending statement.

text.p: Shares in two real estate subsidiaries of Italian industrial group Fiat, Attivita Immobiliari and IPI, have been suspended on the Milan stock market pending an announcement, a stock market council spokesman said.
However, trade on the bourse itself remains blocked due to a technical hitch.
